application.doc: Retrieving details of a particular network HSM device

param.name: type
param.doc: The network HSM type. We currently only support thales.

param.name: addr
param.doc: The address of the network HSM device.

param.name: port
param.doc: The port on which the network HSM device is listening. This is an optional parameter.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve details for the specified network HSM device.
method.doc: To retrieve the details associated with a specific network HSM device using the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the SSL Certificates resource URI, providing the network HSM type and connection information.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: kneti_hash
param.doc: The kneti hash of the network HSM device.

param.name: esn
param.doc: The eletronic serial number of the network HSM device.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
